content:
I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed Ghajini and Asin's performance! As for other Hindi films featuring Asin, here are some popular ones that you might want to check out:

1. Ready (2011) - Asin starred opposite Salman Khan in this romantic comedy film. She played a girl who fakes an engagement so that she can avoid getting married, but things take a hilarious turn when she ends up falling in love with the man she hired to be her fake fiance.

2. Housefull 2 (2012) - Asin was part of the ensemble cast in this comedy film, which was a box-office success. She played the female lead opposite actor Akshay Kumar.

3. Bol Bachchan (2012) - In this comedy film, Asin played the female lead opposite Abhishek Bachchan. The film was a commercial success and Asin's performance was praised for her comic timing and chemistry with the lead actor.

4. London Dreams (2009) - Asin played a musician in this musical drama film, which also starred Salman Khan and Ajay Devgn. The film was set in London and showcased Asin's musical and acting talents.

5. Khiladi 786 (2012) - Asin starred opposite Akshay Kumar in this action-comedy film. The movie received mixed reviews, but Asin's performance was appreciated by the audience.

These are some of Asin's popular Hindi films that you may want to check out. Let me know if you have any other questions!
